reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were friendly, and we were given a complimentary glass of cava on our arrival. We had requested a quiet room on a non-smoking floor. We were given a room at the back of the hotel and slept peacefully. The room was very clean, comfortable and modern. It is equipped with a flat-screen tv and electronic security box. There are also two computer terminals with internet in the lobby for guests.
reviews.title: Great spot in downtown Barcelona
Didn't get to actually stay because they gave away our room
reviews.text: The location, just off of Plaza Catalunya, is close to the major tourist sites and shopping areas. We were able to walk from the hotel to Las Ramblas, the Gothic quarter, Sagrada Familia, Barcoloneta, etc. If you're not so inclined, there is a metro station 1/2 a block away.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We didn't try the restaurant, so can't comment.
reviews.title: Pay for location

reviews.text: We had stayed at this hotel before a few years ago and thought it very well located with modern rooms. But this time, we had a bad experience and ended up at another hotel. My husband lost his wallet and we had to cancel some credit cards. But we did not think this would affect our stay in 2 days in Barcelona at the H10. When we got there after a long train trip from France, we were told the hotel had given our room up since they noted our credit card was not valid and we had arrived after 6pm. It was 640pm. They were not very helpful at first, and then offed to call another hotel to see if they could find us a room, they did but at a much higher price.
reviews.title: Excellent location, nice hotel

reviews.text: Hotel is near Las Ramblas, so you are paying for location. Not as nice as Eurostars gaudi, which is cheaper, but further away. Staff spoke english. WiFi in room. You can hear/feel the metro below but it wasn't keeping us up at night. Near subway station. Didn't get what we reserved - double bed, non-smoking. They did put the twins together. We were told it was non-smoking, but i could smell smoke in the bathroom. Towels are rough, shower door was broken. Maid service came. Not super nice, but i would still recommend it. Bar was never occupied. Didn't try the food, but it looked like a good deal.
reviews.title: Clean, safe and central location for exploring the city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: H10 Universtait is ideal for exploring barcelona, its location is perfect. Airport bus leaves you 2 minutes walk away, Las rambles is only short walf away. The reception staff were friendly and fast, our room was on 6th floor and front facing and had small balcony. room was large and well equiped and spotless.tea/coffee making facilities large flat screen t.v,
reviews.title: ideal location to visit barcelona
Great Location - Super Service
reviews.text: Would highly recommend staying at this hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is bang in the centre of Barcelona. We were given a room on the 6th floor.
reviews.title: Great location, beautiful hotel
Overall a good place to stay
reviews.text: Bus routes start from outside, taxis are readily available, Ramblas and Placa de Gracia are short walks away, and yet, you are not in the noisy/extremely busy areas.
Rooms are good, neat and serve the most delicious hot chocolate i have ever tasted!
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay at the Universitat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A wonderful hotel this is!!!! Just a 5 min walk from the Catalunya Square, this hotel has wonderful rooms, great bathrooms, a decent lobby, very elaborate breakfast spread and a cozy feel to it.
reviews.title: Great Location, Great Hotel, Good Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are great and very very helpful. They made all the bookings for me and were willing to guide me on certain things to do in Barecelona.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel and we hope to stay there again

reviews.text: The location of the hotel is very important, esp if you plan on staying out late in Barcelona. All buses at night land on the Catalunya square and so you will not be stranded. You have two metro stations near by, the Catalunya and the Universitat, both only about 100 meters or so away.
reviews.title: Superbly placed, but very small rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast at the hotel is stupendous with a lot of variety and very continental.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel friendly staff

reviews.text: Only downside was that everytime a metro passed by, the hotel seemed to vibrate. I first thought that it was an earthquake, but other than that, no complaints about this wonderful hotel.
reviews.title: Very good.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are a bit "shopworn" and in need of minor repairs, which caused us to change rooms 3 times during our short (3-night) stay! Inconsistent amenities in the rooms such as missing pillows. The major problem is that no matter what floor you are on, you will feel a regular rumble from the metro below. It's just a block from Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla, so location is convenient, but there are other, better choices.
reviews.title: Just OK...needs maintenance

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in Junior Suite 801, 15-24 September 2010.
reviews.title: Fantastic location, great value for money, amazing breakfasts but you must get room at front

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is in a fantastic location right in the heart of Barcelona near Pl de Catalunya and Pl de Universitat - where you walk almost everywhere. It serves an amazing breakfasts (10 euros if not part of accommodation deal) which you must try. You get a glass of Cava on arrival and can even have one with your breakfast with your international and continental foods - cooked eggs, bacon & sausage, pastries, tortilla, sandwiches, salmon, cheeses, fruits, cakes, etc etc
reviews.title: Great Hotel. Would recommend to family and friends

reviews.text: Room selection is key to enjoying your stay get a room at the front with large opening windows (preferably high up 4th floor and above to avoid metro and traffic noise) and you will love the hotel. Get a room at the back looking onto a wall and tiny and you will think you are in an expensive B&B.
reviews.title: Smooth, modern and impeccably clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Daily you get free water, crisps, small cakes and sandwiches to help yourself to in the bar from about 5 pm. Also the hotel has now just opened a roof terrace where you can take up drinks from the bar and sit in the sun from 11 am until 11 pm a great facility for everyone.
reviews.title: Inexpensive hotel in great location
